response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, but considering its potential impact on your endeavors, we believe it could be an invaluable asset to you as well. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,100,000. This offer is tailored to reflect the significant benefits and opportunities this product can bring to you. We understand the importance of making informed decisions, so please feel free to ask any questions or request additional information. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1100000}
